casebody.data:
Second Department,

April, 1979

(April 2, 1979) Max Feller et al., Respondents, v Band Food Center, Inc., et al., Appellants.

Order of the Supreme Court, Kings County, dated January 3, *10461979, affirmed, with $50 costs and disbursements. No opinion. Lazer, J. P., Rabin, Gulotta and Cohalan, JJ., concur.
